articles.description: As for the laptop, the company will be competing against the likes of Samsung, Huawei, and Xiaomi which have already expanded their offerings.
articles.content:

articles.content:

articles.title: WhatsApp Shopping button now live in India, lets people purchase directly from a chat - The News Minute

articles.title: Vivo V20 SE Aquamarine Green Colour Variant Launched in India at Rs 20,999 - LatestLY
articles.description: Vivo, the Chinese smartphone maker officially launched the Vivo V20 SE Aquamarine green colour model in the Indian market. The smartphone is available for sale on Vivo India's e-store, e-commerce websites & retail stores across the country.
